titleStmt.title: The measures and offices of friendship with rules of conducting it : to which are added, two letters written to persons newly changed in their religion / by Jer. Taylor, D.D.
Discourse of the nature, offices and measures of friendship
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Jeremy, 1613-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.G. for R. Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: First published (1657) with title: A discourse of the nature, offices, and measures of friendship.
"Two letters to persons changed in their religion", p. 117-203, has half-title page.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
